personal.title: Harmonic Bounce - Single
personal.description: In my exploration into MIDI, I compiled and reworked the outro bass track from Animusic's 'Harmonic Voltage' into a fun, house inspired track.

mixes.description: A mashup of Sofi Tukker's 'House Arrest' feat. Gorgon City, and Kaskade's 'Feel It'.

mixes.subtitle: Avicii Ã— Flo Rida

mixes.title: TRY (Ambient Mix)
mixes.subtitle: P!nk
mixes.description: An exploration into stems - This is an ambient mix of P!nk's track 'Try'. It was so much fun using aura and synth sounds combined with the etherial guitar to create a powerful soundscape!

sets.title: The Sn0wHous3 Mix
sets.description: My debut DJ set, where I first experimented with the simplest of transitions between songs.

sets.title: The Blizzard Mix
sets.description: A chill-house mix inspired by HANA and Durante.

sets.title: The Bedtime Mix
sets.description: A mix dedicated to nighttime listening, something calm and progressive to relax to before drifting off for the night.

sets.title: The Liftoff Mix
sets.description: A deep-house inspired mix with a focus on songs that have unique sounds for the house space.
